		                    Advanced Ovarian Epithelial, Fallopian Tube, and Primary Peritoneal Cancer
		                    Treatment of advanced ovarian epithelial cancer, fallopian tube cancer, or primary peritoneal cancer may include the following:         -  Hysterectomy, bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy, and omentectomy. Lymph nodes and other
